question: Which secessionist mobile application has recently been removed by google from Play Store?
explanation: Acceding to Punjab chief minister Captain Amarinder Singh’s demand, IT major Google has removed the secessionist, anti-India Mobile Application ‘2020 Sikh Referendum’ from its Play Store with immediate effect. The Chief Minister, who had also urged the central government to persuade Google in the matter, had asked the DGP to coordinate with central security agencies to tackle the threat resulting from the launch of the app, created by ‘ICETECH’.
